title: why zed needs a nerf
body: so zeds power spike is waaay to strong right now. duskblade is so cheap and youmunus too. and the lethality is insanely high on them as well. please can you nerf zed when he hits lvl 6 and gets duskblade its over. he ults and spins one time on me and deals 430 dmg. and with ignite it feels like a 100% secured kill

replies.body: why do you talk about powerspike like there is only 1 in the game btw zed becomes decen once he has 2 lethality items boots and LDR so it takes u a long time and his lane is bad af too high cds and empowered corrupting pots stopwatch and seekers being a thing means he wont do anything... on top of that he has a low base dmg
11 months ago, how about we look at him now, garunteed whoever replies is just protecting their zed champ dmg is insane that needs to go especially s9{{champion:238}}

Zed is the worst AD assassin in the game, Talon is way worse in the laneing phase. 

The only reason why Zed may crush you in lane is because they are a good Zed player.

Learn how to play against Zed and you will win every time, unless they are an actual god at the champ.
